'''H. Pendleton''' is a judge president over Andy's manslaughter case.

==History==
When [[Andy Herrera]] was charged with manslaughter following the death of [[Jeremy Benanti]], Judge Pendleton accepted her not guilty plea, told her her trial was set for May 17, and set her bail at $100,000.

==Career==
He is a judge for the King County Court.
